mapper.update: UPDATE rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" SET "updateCount" = #{updateCount}, "lastUpdateTimestamp" = #{lastUpdateTimestamp}, "lastUpdateReamsLoginId" = #{lastUpdateReamsLoginId}, "kijunYMD" = #{kijunYMD}, "kijunTimestamp" = #{kijunTimestamp}, "taishoKaishiYMD" = #{taishoKaishiYMD}, "taishoShuryoYMD" = #{taishoShuryoYMD}, "taishoKaishiTimestamp" = #{taishoKaishiTimestamp}, "taishoShuryoTimestamp" = #{taishoShuryoTimestamp} WHERE "subGyomuCode" = #{subGyomuCode} AND "shoriName" = #{shoriName} AND "shoriEdaban" = #{shoriEdaban}
